headline: Jefferies upgrades Pentair, John Bean and Middleby among multi industrials
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies outlined a 2026 roadmap for multi industrial stocks built around growth in power and data centers, margin expansion through internal productivity efforts, and a turn in the capital spending cycle after two years of weak volumes. The brokerage upgraded Pentair, John Bean Technologies and Middleby to Buy, while cutting Emerson Electric and Veralto to Hold.
